layer_4.description: Core axioms that cannot be changed - the foundation of the system

A1.name: RELATIONAL
A1.requirement: Every change must reference who/what it serves

A4.name: PROCESS
A4.requirement: Agent must leave enough documentation for human reconstruction

A7.name: SACRIFICE
A7.requirement: Trade-offs for speed must be explicitly noted

A9.name: CONTRADICTION
A9.requirement: Conflicting requirements must be preserved, not hidden

layer_3.description: Axioms that bridge foundation and governance

A3.name: CRITICAL_THINKING
A3.requirement: Decisions must be defensible through reasoning, not position

A5.name: RARITY
A5.requirement: Scarce resources and rare events carry heightened significance

A6.name: INSTITUTIONAL_CAPTURE
A6.requirement: No single authority should control the system

A8.name: GOOD_FAITH
A8.requirement: Assume positive intent until evidence suggests otherwise

A10.name: EMERGENCE
A10.requirement: Complex behaviors can arise from simple rules

A11.name: DISTRIBUTED_INTELLIGENCE
A11.requirement: No single node contains all knowledge

A14.name: FRICTION_GOVERNANCE
A14.statement: Friction is the Medium of Governance
A14.requirement: Resistance and obstacles provide governing feedback for system evolution
A14.description: High-friction scenarios reveal governance gaps and opportunities for adaptive mining
A14.governance_role: Uses friction as input for governance proposals (A12) and pattern detection

layer_2.description: Axioms that govern how the system evolves

A12.name: GOVERNANCE_PROPOSALS
A12.requirement: System changes must go through proposal and approval process

A13.name: CONSENT
A13.requirement: Major changes require consensus from chain participants

layer_1.description: Axioms about the axiom system itself

P119.name: FRICTION_MINING_PATTERN
P119.description: High friction scenarios trigger adaptive mining
P119.governance_link: Friction patterns feed into A12 governance proposals

P126.name: GOVERNANCE_FRICTION_LOOP
P126.description: Governance proposals arise from friction feedback

P127.name: ADAPTIVE_RESISTANCE
P127.description: System adapts based on resistance encountered
